data/tweet-nytimes/2021/9/14393082736525: Happy 170th birthday, New York Times! On Sept. 18, 1851, the first-ever edition of The New-York Daily Times was published. On Sept. 14, 1857, The New-York Daily Times lost its hyphen and the word Daily and officially became The New York Times. https://t.co/3zABdvfbMS https://t.co/tQm7i3zGCo
